message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $175, but I'm open to negotiation. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I can only pay up to $150. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. While I value the product at more than $150, I'm willing to come down to $160. This is my final offer, let me know if you're still interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counter with an offer of $150. I hope this meets your expectations and we can finalize the transaction.
